alias: 夢幻のティル・ナ・ノーグ
data.description:
The story is set in the otherworldly realm of Tir na nÓg.
This mysterious island, inhabited by a diverse array of fairies and monsters, is explored together with a group of unique and charming heroines.
You'll face off against monsters using each heroine's special magic, or sometimes befriend them to gain an advantage in your journey.
By applying various pieces of knowledge and ingenuity, you'll explore forests, ruins, and a wide range of other locations. At times, you'll relax and have fun by setting up camp or diving into marine sports, making the most of an adventure-filled summer.
This is a story brimming with adventure, dreams, and love, painting the picture of an unforgettable summer.

And as the adventure reaches its climax, a great mystery and numerous truths are revealed.
Together with irreplaceable companions, the protagonist challenges the secrets hidden within Tir na nÓg.

[Translated from [url=https://www.getchu.com/sp/soft.phtml?id=1297310&gc=gc]Getchu[/url]]
data.title: Mugen no Tír na nÓg

alias: Mashiroiro Symphony HD -Love is Pure White-
ましろ色シンフォニー
data.description:
Kagamidai is a blend of two towns, old and new.
Each has colorful scenery and colorful people… but it’s as if the two are painted in completely different colors.

Shingo Uryu is a normal young man from the new side of town, but the academy that he attends is about to be integrated with a venerable edifice of the town’s older side—the prestigious Yuihime Girls Private Academy.
Thrust into a combined class to help test the upcoming merge’s effects, Shingo begins commuting to Yuihime… and his life starts to change.

A somewhat strong-willed young woman who’s firmly against the schools coming together…
A girl who aspires to become a maid due to her mother’s influence…
A young lady as gentle as she is mysterious…
His one and only little sister…
The time he spends with these young women begins to lend his humdrum days a different hue.

[From [url=https://shiravune.com/archives/5650]Shiravune[/url]]
tags: Protagonist's Non-blood-related Sister as a Heroine

links.name: jawiki
links.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ましろ色シンフォニー

data.title: Mashiro-iro Symphony
